programme.title: Incredible Tales S7
programme.desc: Gabbie, a young widower decides to move to a smaller house with her 8y/o daughter, Rachel and take up her friend, Nina's offer for her to become Senior Copywriter at her advertising agency. Here she meets Paolo, a drunkard with a dark story of his own - the mysterious and unsolved death of his 6y/o son, Matthew. In this new home, Rachel mentions a sad little boy' inside her room to her mother, even if Gabbie actually feels the presence of this boy herself...

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

Can the Numbersquad help Izzy to determine which place she has to be, in order to win the second prize?

programme.title: 有何贵食
programme.desc: 民以食为天，人人都爱吃，不管是什么人。吃得好，吃得精已不稀奇，很多人更趋向于吃得奢华，吃得贵，吃得稀有。世界上有些食物或食材以价格昂贵出名。究竟它们有多贵？为何会卖得如此高价？是因为物以稀为贵？还是物以贵为稀？是为了搞噱头？还是背后有什么不为人知的苦衷？那它们的味道有什么特别？它们的烹调法又有何与众不同？想要品尝，得去哪里找？.
